column2: maybe I'm being a bit harsh
column3: but this is honestly the only time I've ever been disappointed by an omakase. The portions are ridiculously tiny
column4: and the majority of the dishes they made for us weren't even fish! To be fair
column6: but nothing memorable and definitely not what should have dominated the omakase. Even the actual nigiri was pretty underwhelming. Many of them were very bland or tasteless
column7: and it almost felt like the chef was just giving us "interesting-sounding" fish that other customers weren't ordering.
